entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sechelt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sechelt 07:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
